Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
19.11.2014 SH SCR19323 BSF405L Added part to trigger the creation of Carrefour BE errorfile (BSF400-22)
14.11.2014 SH SCR19331 BSF405A7 Update INVS_DIRECTDEBITDATE: Changed BPH128.PI.COUNTRY = 'DS' to 'ZZ'
14.11.2014 SH SCR19323 BSF405L Added part "Create Specification for CF ES" (Submit BXA419/BXA420)
12.11.2014 SH SCR19322 BSF405B1 Added update INVS_SFIP_REFERENCE = v.REFERENCE
11.09.2014 SH SCR19140 BSF405A7 Changed BPH128.PI.COUNTRY = 'ZZ' into 'DS'
14.07.2014 SH SCR19014 BSF405INIT: Added test PI.CLNTNO=60130 to perform module "Dia Spain handling";
Renamed "BSF405L - DIA ES handling" in "BSF405L – ING Direct ES handling" and changed update SCFH_FILETYPE
01.07.2014 SH SCR18994 BSF405A7 and BSF405H: Added new field INVS_PAYMENTDETAILS
24.04.2014 SH SCR18856 BSF405A7: Added new field INVS_DIRECTDEBITDATE
06.03.2014 SH SCR18761 BSF405INIT Dia Spain: Added update SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = blank
03.02.2014 SH SCR18693 BSF405INIT Dia Spain: Added update SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC = 0 if one row is file
is rejected; Added BSF405L DIA ES Handling
10.01.2014 SH SCR18623 BSF405INIT, BSF405A, BSF405B: Added Dia Spain handling
04.11.2013 GB SCR18499 BSF405B: Changed condition for update CLNA_ACTIVEUSER
15.10.2013 SH SCR18459 BSF405A7 Added new INVS fields for update (for SCF participation)
24.09.2013 GB SCR18423 BSF405A2: Set SCHI_DEBC_DEBC with SFEX_DEBC_NO
23.08.2013 SH SCR18363 BSF405B Added test SBUY_SCSP_NO = 2 (Prime) and time() > 12:00 to set
CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = "AFTERCUTO"
22.08.2013 SH SCR18368 BSF405B Changed update BSF107.PI.AMOUNT (removed SCFH_SCSP_NO = 3 test)
01.08.2013 SH SCR18307 BSF405A7 Added INVS_DISCOUNTVATRATE and INVS_COMMISSIONVATRATE
19.07.2013 SH SCR18298 BSF405A7 Added update INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE
04.06.2013 SH SCR18179 BSF405B Extended calcualtion of GB107.PI.AMOUNT for SCFH_SCSP_NO = 3 (PR)
04.06.2013 JH SCR18154 BSF405I Added parameter in call of BSF403
23.01.2013 SH SCR17875 Added module BSF405B1 - Preadvice handling
18.02.2012 SH SCR17703 BSF405B Two additional CLAD rows are created now for Carrefour (BE) --> SCFH_SCSP_NO = 2
05.12.2012 GB SCR17775 Changed value of update the INUP_INTERESTCHARGEDC (BSF405F/2. Store INVOICE_UPFRONT)
05.11.2012 SH SCR17623 Deleted BSF405A8
08.10.2012 GB SCR17597 Added condition for call the BSF405A8
05.10.2012 GB SCR17589 Changed value of update the INUP_INTERESTCHARGEDC (BSF405A3/1. Store INVOICE_UPFRONT) from
SCHI_TOTAINTERESTC to SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT – SFEX_THEORETICALCOMMISSION
09.07.2012 SH SCR17399 Added BSF405K for Carrefour and implemented some other small changes; BSF405A Extended
SFEX selection for Carrefour; BSF405INIT Extended module to check allowed finance for Carrefour; BSF405B Added update
INVS_CALCULATEDINTEREST; Added BSF405A8
03.04.2012 SH SCR17149 Removed '_D' from public name
02.04.2012 SH SCR17149 BSF405INIT/BSF405B Changed selection of INVS (INVS_RECEIVABLENUMBER/INVS_FULLAMOUNT/INVS_DEBC_NO)
27.03.2012 SH SCR17149 BSF405I Fixed bug with calling BSF403-D
02.02.2012 SH SCR17092 BSF405C/D Added new SCFH fields for update
12.01.2012 SH SCR17047 BSF405B Added update INVS_INTERESTBASERATE/INVS_INTERESTMARGIN
12.01.2012 GB SCR17042 Added the part Interest bucket handling
19.12.2011 SH SCR16980 BSF405B Added update INVS_DISCOUNTAMOUNT; BSF405I Changed
update SCRH_DATE
06.12.2011 SH SCR16934 BSF405B Added update CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = 'AFTERCUTOF'
24.11.2011 SH SCR16921 BSF404A/BSF405B Changed submit BSP001/BCM001 to call program and removed
time delay of 5 minutes to start the programs; BSF405G1/2 Removed some checks
18.11.2011 SH SCR16912 BSF405B Added new INVS fields for update
17.11.2011 SH SCR16910 Added BSF405J - Document handling
11.11.2011 SH SCR16836 BSF405A7/B added new INVS fields for update;
Split BSF405G in BSF405G1/BSF405G2
09.11.2011 SH SCR16863 Added BSF405I - Prepare files Russia
22.08.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended update SCHI_INVNO to alpha 20
06.05.2011 JOH SCR16406 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
23.03.2011 SH SCR16263 BSF405H Added SFEX_DUEDATE handling
01.02.2011 GB SCR16182 Extended list of parameters in the call BAD013
23.11.2010 SH SCR16009 Added module BSF405INIT
17.11.2010 SH SCR15990 BSF405A/B Added + 5 minutes for BSP001 schedule time
02.11.2010 SH SCR15939 BSF405F Added test to skip storing of INUP is row already
18.10.2010 SH SCR15883 Added module BSF405H
15.10.2010 SH SCR15883 BSF405B Added sort/order SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER
02.10.2010 GB SCR15841 Added condition for call the 2. Store INVOICE_UPFRONT in
the BSF405F
01.10.2010 GB SCR15841 Changed condition for perform the BSF405A3,
extended condition of selection in the BSF405D, changed value of parameter if
the GB101 is call in the BSF405F/1. Book invoice from special account to
factoring account
28.09.2010 GB SCR15830 Fixed bugs in BSF405B (removed the SFEX_SCHI_INVO_NO > 0)
and BSF405F (added missing SQL.SFEX_INVO_NO in the output arguments)
08.09.2010 SH SCR15781 BSF405A Added module BSF405A7; Changed test to
update SCHI_TOTAINTERESTC; BSF405F/G Extended SFEX selection
02.09.2010 SH SCR15766 BSF405D Added test SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0;
BSF405A2 Changed update of SCHI_INVNO (last 10 digits of receivable number)
27.08.2010 SH SCR15755 BSF405B Changed update of CLAD_DESCRIPTION for
CLAD_LINENO = 2 to "Funding request ...."
19.08.2010 SH SCR15725 BSF405B Replaced storage of CLNA by BSF107
06.08.2010 SH SCR15693 BSF405A2/A3 Changed SCHI/INUP updates;
added modules BSF405F, BSF405G
-- only if SCFH_SCSP_NO = 1 (Demica)
@Info, Both BSF405I modules are using the same SFEX selection

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = ':5' and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 and exists (select * from :1/SFER where SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO and (SFER_HANDLED_ACTION1 > 1 or SFER_HANDLED_ACTION2 > 1)) for fetch only

Text.val: -- Finance not allowed
-- Set allowed finance to 0 for all SFEX row (For DIA it is all or nothing)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select SFEX_CURRENCY, SFEX_SUPPLIERID, SFEX_RECEIVABLENUMBER, SFEX_NO, SFEX_ISSUEDATE, SFEX_DUEDATE, SFEX_FULLAMOUNT, SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT, SFEX_DEBC_NO, SFEX_ADMNO, SFEX_CLNTNO, SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT, SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC, SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC, SFEX_CITADELMFST, SCFH_DATE, SFEX_THEORETICALCOMMISSION from :1/SFEX join :1/SCFH on SCFH_NO = SFEX_SCFH_NO exception join :1/SFER on SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO and (SFER_HANDLED_ACTION2 = 0 or SFER_HANDLED_ACTION2 = 3) where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_INVO_NO = 0 and SFEX_SCHI_INVO_NO = 0 and (SCFH_SCSP_NO in (2,4) and SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC > 0 or SCFH_SCSP_NO not in (2,4)) order by SFEX_CURRENCY, SFEX_SUPPLIERID, SFEX_RECEIVABLENUMBER for fetch only

Text.val: -- Set/reset variables
-- with 1 if no previous schedule exists for the client
... set SCHI_INVO_NO
... in client currency
... in general currency
-- Select SFEX again, because of possible updates in previous steps
-- Update INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE
-- Update INVS_DIRECTDEBITDATE (only for DIA)
-- Only necessary (LinkQuery on DEBC/DEBH) to store additional CLAD descriptions for Carrefour BE (SCFH_SCSP_NO = 2 )
-- Only necessary for Dia Spain
-- Charge the client for the advances (only if at least one CLNA row is stored)
-- Set/reset variables
-- Store the advance, one per SupplierID/Currency
... the called task to calculate BSF107.PI.AMOUNT is using the same SFEX
selection as the current task and calculates the totals per SupplierID/Currency
... on R.S. level SFEX_CLNA_ID is updated with v.BSF107.PO.CLNA_ID which belongs
the same SupplierID/Currency group
... else store advances for Dia Spain
... not for Dia Spain
-- Check to postpone advance until tomorrow
-- If at least one CLNA row is stored, BCM001 has to be called at the end of
this module

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC - SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT - SFEX_DISCOUNTVATAMOUNTDEM - SFEX_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM - SFEX_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SUPPLIERID = ':2' and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = ':7' and SFEX_CURRENCY = ':3' and SFEX_SCFH_NO = :4 and SFEX_ADMNO = :5 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :6 and SFEX_CLNA_ID = 0 and SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC > 0 for fetch only

select cast(sum(SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC - SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SUPPLIERID = ':2' and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = ':7' and SFEX_CURRENCY = ':3' and SFEX_SCFH_NO = :4 and SFEX_ADMNO = :5 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :6 and SFEX_CLNA_ID = 0 and SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC > 0 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Store max 3 CLIENT_ADVANCE_DESCRIPTION rows
... 2 additional desecriptions for Carrefour BE (SCFH_SCSP_NO = 2)
-- Store SFCH row, to trigger the creation of the file via BSF400-5 for Demica
-- Store SFCH row, to trigger the creation of the file via BSF400-6 for Demica
-- All errors are handled, set status to 14 (Errors handled)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select SFEX_CURRENCY, SFEX_SUPPLIERID, SFEX_RECEIVABLENUMBER, SFEX_NO, SFEX_ISSUEDATE, SFEX_DUEDATE, SFEX_FULLAMOUNT, SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT, SFEX_DEBC_NO, SFEX_ADMNO, SFEX_CLNTNO, SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT, SFEX_INVO_NO, SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC, SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC, SCFH_DATE, SFEX_THEORETICALCOMMISSION from :1/SFEX join :1/SCFH on SCFH_NO = SFEX_SCFH_NO exception join :1/SFER on SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO and SFER_HANDLED_ACTION2 = 0 where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_INVO_NO > 0 and SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC > 0 and SFEX_SCHI_INVO_NO = 0 and SFEX_CLNA_ID > 0 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Book the invoice from special account to factoring account

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (SFEX_DISCOUNTVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX join :1/SCFH on SCFH_NO = SFEX_SCFH_NO where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_CLNA_ID > 0 for fetch only

select cast(sum(SFEX_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (SFEX_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX join :1/SCFH on SCFH_NO = SFEX_SCFH_NO where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_CLNA_ID > 0 and SFEX_COMMISSIONISDISCOUNT = 'Y' for fetch only

select cast(sum(SFEX_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (SFEX_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX join :1/SCFH on SCFH_NO = SFEX_SCFH_NO where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_CLNA_ID > 0 and SFEX_COMMISSIONISDISCOUNT = 'N' for fetch only

select SFEX_INVO_NO, SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT, SFEX_DUEDATE, SFEX_PAYMENTDETAILS from :1/SFEX exception join :1/SFER on SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO and SFER_HANDLED_ACTION2 = 0 join :1/INVS on INVS_INVO_NO = SFEX_INVO_NO and (INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT <> SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT or INVS_DUEDATE <> SFEX_DUEDATE or INVS_PAYMENTDETAILS <> SFEX_PAYMENTDETAILS) where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_INVO_NO > 0 and SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC = 0 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Store first SCRH row, to trigger the creation of the traded invoice file via BSF500-11
-- Store second SCRH row, to trigger the creation of the payment instruction file via BSF500-12
-- set SCRH_NO
-- set SCRH_FILESEQUENCENUMBER
-- Populate MQ263 (MQ with pending documents)
-- Store 2 SFCH rows, to trigger the creation of files via BSF400-21/22 for Carrefour
-- Store SCFH row to trigger the creation of the file in BSF400-37 and BSF400-39
-- Create specification for Carrefour ES
... trigger the creation of the Carrefour BE errorfile (used also for Carrefour ES) via BSF400-22
